actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to establish a select committee on Mexico-United States relations.

summary.text: Establishes within the House of Representatives a Select Committee on Mexico-United States Relations to study matters including: (1) Mexican nationals illegally present in the United States; (2) economic interrelationships; and (3) illegal narcotics traffic between the two countries. Requires the Committee to report to the House as soon as practicable during the present Congress the results of its study.

titles.title: A bill to establish a select committee on Mexico-United States relations.
